mapper.update: update tt_addr set receiver = #{receiver,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, phone = #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, detail = #{detail,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, created_on = #{createdOn,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, created_by = #{createdBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, updated_on = #{updatedOn,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, updated_by = #{updatedBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, USER_ID = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, AREA_ID = #{areaId,jdbcType=INTEGER} where ADDR_ID = #{addrId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select ADDR_ID, receiver, phone, detail, created_on, created_by, updated_on, updated_by, USER_ID, AREA_ID from tt_addr where ADDR_ID = #{addrId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
select ADDR_ID, receiver, phone, detail, created_on, created_by, updated_on, updated_by, USER_ID, AREA_ID from tt_addr
